content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_min_20260129/holon-vaadin7 is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
Let me start by exploring the repository structure to understand the codebase and then migrate it from Java 8 to Java 17.

First, I'll:
1. View the repository structure
2. Check for pom.xml files to understand the Maven configuration
3. Update Java version in pom.xml files
4. Check for any Java 8 specific code that needs updating
5. Run mvn clean verify to ensure everything works
